alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EAST CENTRAL AITKIN AND WESTERN CARLTON COUNTIES THROUGH 230 PM CDT... At 200 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over McGregor, or 10 miles south of Big Sandy Lake, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... McGregor around 205 PM CDT. Mille Lacs Band East Lake Area around 210 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Tamarack. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. This storm may intensify. Monitor local NOAA Weather Radio, commercial radio, or television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin
